Posts.Content: Aug 4, 2013 11:20PM pmchanco wrote: Hi All My wife just joined. She is pmchanco in the chat room.  She was diagnosed in May with stage 4 breast cancer to bone marrow and a related paraneoplastic syndome causing spinal cord degeneration.  She walks with a cane and has had a painful lower leg neuropathy.  Her chemo is limited by her compromised bone marrow presently.
